amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that 50 percent of the federal share of the Land and Water Conservation Fund be used to maintain and manage lands already in Federal ownership.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 106-612 require that 50% of the federal share of the funding for the Land and Water Conservation Fund provided in the bill be used to maintain and manage lands already in federal ownership.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 256 (Roll no. 169).
